title: On Frobenius graphs of diameter 3 for finite groups
authors:
Thomas Breuer and L\'aszl\'o H\'ethelyi and Erzs\'ebet Horv\'ath and
  Burkhard K\"ulshammer
abstract:
For a subgroup $H$ of a finite group $G$, the Frobenius graph $\Gamma(G, H)$
records the constituents of the restrictions to $H$ of the irreducible
characters of $G$. We investigate when this graph has diameter 3.
